body.p: One of letters other day from farmer at Kendall and he tell about Indian reporter all wrong about when tell about grasshopper poison kill all birds and say bait for grasshopper all sawdust and only just little bit of poison and say birds wonâ€™t eat dead grasshoppers tat been poisoned and tell in letter that poison for gopher sand things like that do kill birds. Maybe Indian reporter wrong sometimes but not very many times but find lots of dead birds in woods. People tell Indian reporter about a baby girl born to Guy Redeagle and his wife at Indian hospital. I think Guy Redeagle pretty proud fellow to have baby girl. 25th June all Tomah Indians that dance at Wisconsin Dells in summer time go downs and do things and get ready for big ceremonial at Stand Rock and other places in summer and season start July 1. Some Indians stay at Stand Rock all summer and others return to home to help do things Indians all tribes do same dances together and come from all over country, Mexico, Texas and everywhere. Every summer people everybody know like Bing Crosby and movie people come to see Indians dance and hear Indian angers like Chief Silvertongue and maybe some time people come from long way off to hear Lavern Carimon and he one of singers there now last two years. Jim Smoke that everybody in Tomah know tell people all about it at show. Fred Stutzke tell about Indian reporter all humbug when tell in Indian News about moon and tell when going to be wet and what white man say same thing going to be dry moon. Indians know about rain by what moon look like long time back and maybe Mr. Stutzke know somethings about moon but Indian reporter show he was all right when he tell about going to have rain about 25th June and everybody tell you he was right too. Winnebagoes going to have some kind of dance at Hatfield sometime this month for Indians that were in war and hear people around Tomah talk about going to big dance. Always have big time at dance like that. .
